hero.title: Automate your business with AI

features.title: Why choose
features.subtitle: Automation that works, no drama. Practical results with total transparency and cutting-edge technology.

fastDelivery.title: Fast delivery
fastDelivery.description: Short cycles, visible impact in days, not months. Rapid prototyping and continuous iteration.

visibleKPIs.title: Visible KPIs
visibleKPIs.description: Clear metrics in production, transparent dashboards and automated reports.

noNonsense.title: No nonsense
noNonsense.description: Sober design, focus on results. Zero buzzwords, maximum efficiency.

directSupport.description: Talk to those who do it, no layers. Direct access to technicians.

intelligentAutomation.title: Intelligent automation
intelligentAutomation.description: AGI applied where it makes sense. Optimized processes with cutting-edge technology.

guaranteedSecurity.title: Guaranteed security

consulting.title: Consulting

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the ideal plan for your business

q1.question: How long does implementation take?
q1.answer: Implementation time varies depending on project complexity, but typically between 2 to 8 weeks.

q2.question: Do you offer support after implementation?
q2.answer: Yes, all our plans include ongoing support. The level of support varies depending on the chosen plan.

q3.question: Can I cancel at any time?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your plan at any time without penalties.

q4.question: What technologies do you work with?
q4.answer: We work with the latest technologies, including Python, Node.js, React, Next.js, and AI tools like OpenAI and Anthropic.
